name: opelopab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1))

stmt.origin: opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w2, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w2, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

comment: The law of concretion. Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)
